allLocationsDescription: Find long-term care home locations that best suit your needs.
javascriptRequiredPart1: JavaScript is required to view this page.
javascriptRequiredPart2: To have a better experience, you need to:
locationErrorMessage: Enter an address, city, postal code or home name
locationLookupErrorMessage: Sorry, we could not find your current location. Make sure to give us permission to access your location first, and try again.
mapResultsSummary_zero: There are no matching results. Check the information you entered and try again.
tryA: Enter an address, city, postal code or home name
unknownLocation: We couldn't find a match for {{location}}.

beds.heading: {{count, number}} licensed beds
beds.shortStayNotAvailable: Note: short stay beds are currently not available due to COVID-19.

covid19Data.heading: COVID-19 Data
covid19Data.body: <0>Get data</0> about how this home managed COVID-19.

apply.heading: Ready to apply?
apply.body: To apply to this home or homes in this area contact Home and Community Care Support Services for the <2><0>{{hccssName}}<1><0></0><1></1></1></0></2> region.

waitTimes.heading: {{count, number}} day median wait time
waitTimes.detail: Wait times for long term care homes can vary widely. Your placement coordinator can provide options that will best meet your needs.
waitTimes.learnMoreHCCSS: Learn more about wait times for the {{hccss}} region
waitTimes.firstChoice: {{count, number}} people are on the waiting list for this home as their first choice.

fullyVaccinated.staffMembersInclude: Staff includes employees, agency staff, student placements and volunteers. All staff must have received all required doses of COVID-19 vaccine by December 13, 2021, to work, train or volunteer in a long-term care home, unless they have a valid medical exemption.
fullyVaccinated.heading: {{count}}% staff fully vaccinated
fullyVaccinated.oneDose: {{count}}% of staff have received 1 dose of a recognized COVID-19 vaccine
fullyVaccinated.twoDoses: {{count}}% of staff are fully vaccinated with all required doses of a COVID-19 vaccine
fullyVaccinated.lastUpdated: Vaccination rates are current as of {{lastUpdated, datetime}}.

lastInspection.heading: Inspection report
lastInspection.detail: Inspections are conducted by the Ministry of Long-Term Care and all of the reports created by the inspectors are made available for public access.
lastInspection.lastInspectionDate: Date last inspection report posted: {{lastInspectionDate, datetime}}
lastInspection.learnMoreLinkText: Get all posted inspection reports for this home

types.Critical Incident Inspection with Order(: Critical Incident Inspection with Order(s) of the Inspector

visit.heading: Visit this home
visit.bodyNoWebsite: Contact the home directly to arrange an in-person visit.
visit.body: Visit the <2>{{homeName}} website<2><0></0><1></1></2></2> to learn more about this home. Contact the home directly to arrange an in-person visit.

whereToStart.heading: Don’t know where to start?
whereToStart.body: Get one-on-one help from a <2>placement coordinator<1><0></0><1></1></1></2>

accredited.heading: Accredited provider
accredited.body: This home strives to improve quality, safety and efficiency of their performance.

MapWithMarker.errorLoadingMap: It’s taking longer to load the content. Check your internet connection or try to refresh the page. If it persists, try again later.
